tool.summary: Topographic Position Index (TPI) calculation as proposed by Guisan et al. (1999). This is literally the same as the difference to the mean calculation (residual analysis) proposed by Wilson & Gallant (2000). The bandwidth parameter for distance weighting is given as percentage of the (outer) radius.
